title: Add uploaded photos to the existing Valentine’s gallery

requirements.summary: Include two user-uploaded photos as additional static gallery items in the existing “Our Beautiful Moments” section using the existing FramedGalleryImage rendering.
acceptanceCriteria: Both uploaded image files are added to the frontend as static assets and are accessible via stable URLs at runtime (no broken images in production build).
The gallery in frontend/src/components/sections/GallerySection.tsx includes new entries for both uploaded images and renders them using the existing FramedGalleryImage component.
The new gallery items have English alt text (e.g., “Our beautiful moment” / “A special memory”) and do not break the responsive grid layout on mobile and desktop.
No changes are required to the backend; the site continues to function as a static single-page experience with the new images displayed.

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded image as a public static asset so it is served at runtime via a stable URL.
Add the uploaded image as a public static asset so it is served at runtime via a stable URL.

Append two new entries to the existing galleryImages list referencing the new public asset paths and provide English alt text; ensure they render via the existing FramedGalleryImage component and preserve the current responsive grid behavior.
